group_1.textRight: ...That's all for today.
The final test is soon,@so please review everything for it.

group_1.textLeft: ...Zzz...zzz...nyum...

group_1.textRight: ...She slept all through the morning, didn't she?
I'm gonna tell Akari.
Good day. Sorry to bother you all.

group_1.textLeft: Hiya, Akari! Hotaru was sleepin' again.

group_1.textRight: Again...?
*Sigh*... Sorry, I didn't mean for her to be a bother.

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's just how it usually is around here.

group_1.textRight: Get up!

group_1.textLeft: Mm...mm～...@Akarii...?

group_1.textRight: I heard you were asleep during the entire class.@It's already lunchtime.

group_1.textLeft: ...So it iiis～@It's already lunch breaaak～...
I waaas wonderiiing...why I was feeling so@hungryyy～...

group_1.textRight: Right, so get up first, then we'll eat lunch.

group_1.textLeft: Kaaay～...
Huuh...? There's a bento box in heeere～...?

group_1.textRight: Your mother gave it to me,@so I put it in with your things.

group_1.textLeft: That's my Akariii～... Thanks～...

group_1.textRight: Good grief... It's because you're so helplessly careless,@Hotaru.

group_1.textLeft: I put the desks together. Let's eat lunch!
Mm～... This sure is good, isn't iiit...?@I love it, but...
Eating is such a draaag...

group_1.textRight: That's no excuse to sleep through your meals.

group_1.textLeft: Buuut...

group_1.textRight: No buts. I'll cut it into little pieces for you.

group_1.textLeft: Woww～... They're so easy to eat...@Thanks～

group_1.textRight: ...So Hotaru, where'd you meet such a nice girl?
The elementary and high schools aren't connected@in any way, right?

group_1.textLeft: How we met, you aaask～...?@You could say sheee...picked me up...

group_1.textRight: ...Picked you up? What does that mean?

group_1.textLeft: Well ya seee～... If I remember riiight...
It was by the rabbit hutch, wasn't iiit～...?

group_1.textRight: Right, I found you collapsed by the rabbit hutch@so I took charge in protecting you.
Only Hotaru would be protected by an elementary@school kid...

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe... I was just thinking～@what a pain walking iiis～...
The sun was getting nice and warm,@so why not lie down for a biiit～...?

group_1.textRight: People normally don't lie down and sleep for that@reason...
Umm...a rabbit hutch...like the kind you take care of@in elementary school?
Why were you hangin' out in a place like that@to begin with?

group_1.textLeft: Why was I theeere～...?@Maybe I was taking a shortcuuut～...?

group_1.textRight: I...see... It's a good thing Akari here@was the one who picked you up...

group_1.textLeft: Akari, I imagine that must have frightened you too?

group_1.textRight: ...I suppose, just a little. It was the first time@I had to do something like that...

group_1.textLeft: Huhh...? You were freaked ouuut～...?
I'd never seen someone so frantic before～...

group_1.textRight: [chara:305701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Waiー!

group_1.textLeft: Thaaat's...a totally normal reaction@to seeing someone fallen on the ground...
Or rather, why's the girl who did the scarin'@the one telling the story here...?

group_1.textRight: No! I was not scared...!

group_1.textLeft: Mm～... You weeeren't～?
Then that means...@Back then, she protected Hotaru,
so Akari is Hotaru's "guardian" now.

group_1.textRight: Well, I couldn't just leave her,@so it's not like I had a choice.
I have to take care of her.@That's all that was on my mind...

group_1.textLeft: Zzz...zzz...
...Guess we'll never know.

group_1.textRight: I'm sure it must be rough work though.
